EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Enterprise Case Study - Swiss Re - 2015.03.25.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Enterprise Case Study: Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We are excited to invite you to our new enterprise case study webinar, “Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite”! In the webinar, Swiss Re’s Ismail Celik, head of Test Automation, will share how Swiss Re managed to address a serious database testing issue and simultaneously:
- Increase quality assurance - Cut costs - Reduce testing time from 63 days to 3 days of automated testing
Our “Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite” webinar will take place on March 25th, 2015, starting at 4:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-enterprise-case-study-swiss-re.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-enterprise-case-study-swiss-re.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed, Mar 25, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m. EDT 8:00 a.m. – 9:00 a.m. PDT
Ismail Celik Head of Test Automation Swiss Re
